column3: 469}}), born '''Urwen''', was the second child of [[Húrin]] and [[Morwen]], sister of [[Túrin

column1: Urwen was a happy child and her parents gave her the [[epessë
column2: nickname]] "Laughter" (''Lalaith''), from the nearby river, [[Nen Lalaith]]. She was three years old when she died of a plague sent out from [[Angband]]. Her death was especially hard on her older brother Túrin.<ref>{{CH
lalaith]]'', meaning "laughter". Her birth name, Urwen, means "Fire Maiden" (from ''[[ûr]]'' = "fire, hot" and ''[[gwenn]]'' = "maiden").
